episodes.title: Act VI
episodes.description: “I must create a system, or be enslav’d by another man’s.”Jennings returns to Apollo one last time in the throes of a global catastrophe that looks much like the tragedies that Robert predicted. He finds that while the rest of the world is suffering the effects of the pandemic, the Fellowship is benefiting from it. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

episodes.title: Act V
episodes.description: “Vice thrives and lives by concealment.”The Fellowship has been sued by former members and investigated by the Department of Homeland Security, but the organization has never been charged with wrongdoing. How has it been able to operate for half a century despite several credible accusations of sexual abuse? Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

episodes.title: Act IV
episodes.description: “Oh threats of hell and hopes of paradise.”Jennings goes back to Apollo to find out if the Fellowship has done anything to protect members from Robert’s coercive behavior, or if the organization just got better at hiding it. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

episodes.title: Act III
episodes.description: “Long was he puzzled to assume a shape most fit, and expeditious for the rape.” After observing how Robert Burton engenders devotion from his followers, Jennings travels across the country interviewing former members of the Fellowship—several of whom accuse Burton of sexual abuse.  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

episodes.title: Act II
episodes.description: “Come, let us take a muster speedily: Doomsday is near; die all, die merrily.”Jennings returns to Apollo on the week of the predicted apocalypse to see how the Fellowship community prepares for the end of the world.  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

episodes.title: Act I
episodes.description: “In the middle of the journey of our life I found myself within a dark wood.” After hearing about the Fellowship of Friends from one of its former members, investigative journalist Jennings Brown visits Apollo, the spiritual organization’s compound, to uncover more about the group and its mysterious leader, Robert Burton.  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

episodes.title: Official Trailer: Revelations
episodes.description: In 2018, investigative journalist Jennings Brown met with the Fellowship of Friends, an elite spiritual organization whose leader had predicted global catastrophe. But the end-times prophecy was just the beginning… Revelations is a Spotify Original from Parcast. Produced by Blumhouse Television, Vespucci, Gilded Audio, Jennings Brown, and Dan Rosato. Hosted by Jennings Brown. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
